abstract: On the “Today” show, Ryan Seacrest will be a special correspondent, under his new two-year “multi-platform” agreement. He also will report from the Olympics and be part of election coverage.
snippet: On the “Today” show, Ryan Seacrest will be a special correspondent, under his new two-year “multi-platform” agreement. He also will report from the Olympics and be part of election coverage.
lead_paragraph: Look for Ryan Seacrest to be appearing soon on NBC’s “Today” show and on the network’s coverage of special events like the Olympics.

headline.main: Seacrest’s Role at NBCUniversal Will Span News, Sports and Entertainment
